about.introText:
I have been coding web pages since high school. Then I sat up at night in front of the monitor screen and stared at the strange and incomprehensible (for many people) HTML tags. Of course I do not have to mention that it turned out to be my passion. Thanks to this passion, later I graduated from computer science and I still love coding in languages used for web development.

Currently I working as a Front-end Developer in Execon ITS company.
about.introSiteText:
To create this site I used technologies, frameworks, scripts and libraries such as:

  • HTML
  • Sass - In this page I don't use any graphics file (except portfolio)
  • BEM
  • RWD - Mobile First
  • JavaScript
  • Angular JS
  • jQuery
  • PHP - only for mail sender because my hosting don't support node.js
  • JSON - text in polish and english language
  • textillate.js - main site text effect
  • lettering.js - required for textillate.js
  • enter-view.js
  • Google Fonts - Jura
  • Visual Studio Code
  • GIT
  • GitHub - repository with my site available here: github.com/tomekmy
  • Webpack
  • Chrome Developer Tools

works.title: Wystaw śmieci
works.description:
The PWA application that reminds you of garbage collection deadlines in the city of Zielonka. The application allows you to review garbage collection dates and allows you to enable or disable notifications for individual sectors.

App was written in Angular 5 and integrated with the OneSignal API.

works.title: Wystaw śmieci
works.description:
Landing Page of application which notify users about garbage collection dates in the city of Zielonka. The application is designed for Android systems and in addition to notifications allows you to review the dates of garbage collection.

In the future, this site will be replaced by web app with equivalent functionality as Android app.

In this project i used: vuetify.js
